title: Image Processing Applications

title: AES
snippet: As a final project for the course "Computer Architecture", Juan Manuel Ledesma and I designed a device that could cypher and decypher files using the Rijndael algorithm implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard.

title: mopiOS
snippet: As a final project for the course EE445M "Embedded and Real-Time Operating Systems Laboratory" at UT Austin, Cole Morgan and I started developing our own RTOS implementation. mopiOS is still a work in progress and I'm currently working on...
